availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hiram Satterfield (Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and schoolteacher)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and schoolteacher. North Carolina native. Son of Mary Satterfield. Married to Eliza Satterfield. Father of Corena Satterfield, Walter C. Springfield, John Satterfield, James B. Satterfield, and Mary Satterfield. Farmer in Person County, North Carolina, in 1850. Schoolteacher in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, North Carolina, Person County, p. 473B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 641.
North Carolina Marriage Bonds , 171793-1868, North Carolina State Archives, Raleigh, NC, RG 048, Person County.
"Hiram James Satterfield (1813-1893)," Find A Grave, Memorial #110307957, accessed December 15, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/110307957.
